projects.name: Shachihata Cloud System
projects.role: From Full-stack Developer → Key Member → Module Lead
roleDes: Developed and maintained core modules including digital signature workflows, document management, and approval processes.
Designed architecture for key modules to ensure scalability and high performance.
Mentored team members, conducted code reviews, and coordinated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features on time.
projects.des: Electronic Document Signing and Management System – SaaS Platform for Enterprises. Contributed to the development of a large-scale system focused on electronic document signing. The platform allows users to upload documents, digitally sign them, and send for approval. It supports long-term document storage, full-text search, and follows strict security standards. The system also includes HRM features such as employee management, attendance tracking, leave request/approval, and work scheduling. Designed as a multi-tenant SaaS solution, the system serves multiple independent organizations.
